5701 MONKLAND AVE, MONTREAL, QUEBEC, H4A 1E7

span.div: 1. Internal production time is 6 weeks and does not begin until:
Quotation and design have been signed and sent to Urban Bonfire
50% deposit is received via Cheque, Wire Transfer, Visa or Mastercard
Quotation and design has been approved and countersigned by Urban Bonfire
Total balance due (including freight and taxes) must be paid in full by Cheque, Wire Transfer, Visa or Mastercard prior to shipping.
Freight is calculated as FOB Champlain, NY and will be sent via dock to dock transport unless otherwise requested and confirmed
If/where applicable, taxes (GST, PST, HST) will be added to invoices
Revisions/changes to designs that are already in production will incur charges and/or delays/revised production times.
No returns will be accepted without a Return Authorization number from Urban Bonfire
Client is responsible for verification of goods upon receipt and signature of acceptance of delivery.
Orders not shipped within 10 working days of completion will incur storage fees of $75 per pallet per week.
While every effort is made to ensure precise paint matching, minor variances between sample swatches and final product may occur.
Installation is the sole responsibility of the client and is intended to be completed by a skilled and experienced tradesperson.

Urban Bonfire takes no responsibility for gas, venting, electrical, draining, water, or other site factors and assumes the client has verified any/all municipal, provincial and federal laws and codes to ensure compliance.
1. Internal production time is 6 weeks and does not begin until:
a. Quotation and design have been signed and sent to Urban Bonfire
b. 50% deposit is received (See payment instruction below)
c. Sales Order and Drawings have been approved
2. Total balance due (including freight and taxes) must be paid in full prior to shipping.
3. Freight is calculated as FOB Champlain, NY and will be sent via dock to dock transport unless otherwise requested and confirmed.
4. If/where applicable, taxes (GST, PST, HST) will be added to invoices.
5. Revisions/changes to designs that are already in production will incur charges and/or delays/revised production times.
6. No returns will be accepted without a Return Authorization number from Urban Bonfire.
7. Client is responsible for verification of goods upon receipt and signature of acceptance of delivery.
8. Orders not shipped within 10 working days of completion will incur storage fees.
9. While every effort is made to ensure precise paint matching, minor variances between sample swatches and final product may occur.
10. Installation is the sole responsibility of the client and is intended to be completed by a skilled and experienced tradesperson.

11. Urban Bonfire takes no responsibility for gas, venting, electrical, draining, water, or other site factors and assumes the client has verified any/all municipal, provincial and federal laws and codes to ensure compliance.

span.div: 1. Internal production time is 6 weeks and does not begin until:
a. Quotation and design have been signed and sent to Urban Bonfire
b. 50% deposit is received (See payment instruction below)
c. Sales Order and Drawings have been approved
2. Total balance due (including freight and taxes) must be paid in full prior to shipping.

3. Freight is calculated as FOB Champlain, NY for US bound shipments and FOB Montreal, QC for Canadian bound shipments and will be sent via dock to dock transport unless otherwise requested and confirmed.
4. If/where applicable, taxes (GST, PST, HST) will be added to invoices.
5. Revisions/changes to designs that are already in production will incur charges and/or delays/revised production times.
6. No returns will be accepted without a Return Authorization number from Urban Bonfire.
7. Client is responsible for verification of goods upon receipt and signature of acceptance of delivery.
8. Orders not shipped within 10 working days of completion will incur storage fees.
9. While every effort is made to ensure precise paint matching, minor variances between sample swatches and final product may occur.
10. Installation is the sole responsibility of the client and is intended to be completed by a skilled and experienced tradesperson.

11. Urban Bonfire takes no responsibility for gas, venting, electrical, draining, water, or other site factors and assumes the client has verified any/all municipal, provincial and federal laws and codes to ensure compliance.

span.p:
GST/HST Registration No.: 804660280
QST Registration No.: 1219219594TQ0001

span.div:
ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Sign off on drawings in the Proposal Package
2. Sign off on Sales Order
3. Remit 50% deposit (Checks payable to Urban Bonfire Inc. Wire instructions below)
Terms:
50% deposit due to place order.
Balance due prior to shipment of Goods.

--
WIRE TRANSFER INSTRUCTIONS

div.div: RBC- Royal Bank Of Canada ( Monkland & Harvard Branch)

div.span: FOR US TRANSFERS IN US FUNDS ONLY:
div.div:
Beneficiary Bank Account Information: (use all numbers)
003(institution)-03901(transit)-4002226(account)
Intermediary Bank Information (coming from USA to Canada)
Intermediary Bank Name: J.P. Morgan Chase New-York

div.span: FOR CANADIAN TRANSFERS IN CAD FUNDS:

div.div: Beneficiary Bank Account Information: (use all numbers)

span.div: 1. Internal production time is 6 weeks and does not begin until:
a. Quotation and design have been signed and sent to Urban Bonfire
b. 50% deposit is received (See payment instruction below)
c. Sales Order and Drawings have been approved
2. Total balance due (including freight and taxes) must be paid in full prior to shipping.

3. Freight is calculated as FOB Champlain, NY for US bound shipments and FOB Montreal, QC for Canadian bound shipments and will be sent via dock to dock transport unless otherwise requested and confirmed.
4. If/where applicable, taxes (GST, PST, HST) will be added to invoices.
5. Revisions/changes to designs that are already in production will incur charges and/or delays/revised production times.
6. No returns will be accepted without a Return Authorization number from Urban Bonfire.
7. Client is responsible for verification of goods upon receipt and signature of acceptance of delivery.
8. Orders not shipped within 10 working days of completion will incur storage fees.
9. While every effort is made to ensure precise paint matching, minor variances between sample swatches and final product may occur.
10. Installation is the sole responsibility of the client and is intended to be completed by a skilled and experienced tradesperson.

11. Urban Bonfire takes no responsibility for gas, venting, electrical, draining, water, or other site factors and assumes the client has verified any/all municipal, provincial and federal laws and codes to ensure compliance.
Order is subject to the Terms & Conditions published on the Resources page of urbanbonfire.com. If you have any questions concerning this invoice, please contact design@urbanbonfire.com

b. 50% deposit is received (See payment instruction below)
c. Sales Order and Drawings have been approved
2. Total balance due (including freight and taxes) must be paid in full prior to shipping.

3. Freight is calculated as FOB Champlain, NY for US bound shipments and FOB Montreal, QC for Canadian bound shipments and will be sent via dock to dock transport unless otherwise requested and confirmed.
4. If/where applicable, taxes (GST, PST, HST) will be added to invoices.
5. Revisions/changes to designs that are already in production will incur charges and/or delays/revised production times.
6. No returns will be accepted without a Return Authorization number from Urban Bonfire.
7. Client is responsible for verification of goods upon receipt and signature of acceptance of delivery.
8. Orders not shipped within 10 working days of completion will incur storage fees.
9. While every effort is made to ensure precise paint matching, minor variances between sample swatches and final product may occur.
10. Installation is the sole responsibility of the client and is intended to be completed by a skilled and experienced tradesperson.

11. Urban Bonfire takes no responsibility for gas, venting, electrical, draining, water, or other site factors and assumes the client has verified any/all municipal, provincial and federal laws and codes to ensure compliance.
